Tork Dispenser for Napkins Xpressnap Cafe Clear Black N10
Our Price: $40.60 (inc GST)
R.R.P: $60.50
Description:
Whether you are preparing an elegant dinner or managing a fast food restaurant, Tork has the perfect napkin. The Tork napkin range caters for your needs from air-laid textile feel napkins through to Tork Xpressnap dispenser napkin systems. Why pay retail pricing, when you can buy quality products online from Toilet Paper Plus and save on the price of Tork Dispensers. Toilet Paper Plus offers fast, free delivery anywhere in Australia. Please Note: Tork Dispensers may take up to seven days delivery.
Features:
Colour: Black Material: ABS Plastic System: N10 New Tork Xpressnap Cafésaves on space, costs and napkin consumption Ideal for use on individual tables and on counters where space is limited Hygienic one-at-a-time napkin dispensing significantly decreases wastage and cost Use the AD-a-Glance message display panel to promote your business, announce specials or events and generate revenue
Details
Product Code: 2307947
Product Quantity: One Dispenser per Carton
Similar Quality Products: This product has no related products.
